channel.title: Comments on: Moshe Kline and the Structured Mishnah
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Andy
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description: Rabbi Kline and I have been working together for almost a decade now. His work is nothing short of a major rediscovery. Anyone truly interested in 'hearing' the voice of Hashem should consider learning to read the Torah as tabular logic.
item.content:encoded: Rabbi Kline and I have been working together for almost a decade now. His work is nothing short of a major rediscovery. Anyone truly interested in ‘hearing’ the voice of Hashem should consider learning to read the Torah as tabular logic.
